name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FuseBase Assistant - AI Chat and Screenshots

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT-like extension that answers questions and solves tasks from screenshots - like math, translations, and more.

long.el,en,en_AU,ko,lt,lv,ml,mr,ms,nl,no,pt_P:
FuseBase Assistant: Your All-in-One AI Productivity Tool

üöÄ Work Smarter with Screenshots
Highlight any part of your screen, and let FuseBase do the rest! Solve tasks, translate text, or get clear explanations from your screenshots.

Case: Struggling with a complex math problem? Highlight it, and FuseBase provides the solution instantly‚Äîperfect for students.

üåê Universal Questions Made Easy
Ask anything, anytime. From translations to summaries and answers to general questions, FuseBase is your go-to AI assistant for everyday tasks beyond your workspace.

Case: Need a quick summary of an article? Paste the text, and FuseBase delivers a concise version in seconds.

üìö Powerful Workspace Knowledge
Connect to your FuseBase workspace and get instant answers from your internal knowledge base. Ideal for support, sales, and customer success teams looking to save time and boost accuracy.

Case: Customer support teams can instantly retrieve product details during client calls, enhancing response times and satisfaction.
